content.rendered:
PremierBet Kenya Review

Premierbet is one of the many international betting sites seeking to take over the Kenyan market. It has its headquarters in London (UK) and multiple branches in other parts of the world including Africa. This company started operating in the country back in 2016 and has been doing so till today. It is one of the few betting sites with user=friendly interface and a number of nice discounts.

PremierBet Kenya at a glance.

Features        Odds        Markets Offered        Customer Service

Summary

What is unique about this company is the fact that it has a number of physical shops throughout the country and you can make withdrawals or place bets from these shops. Tis company offers a wide array of betting options which you are certain to enjoy.

OVERALL

4       

USER REVIEW 3.33 (3 votes)

VISIT PREMIERBET KENYA

In-depth Review

Bonuses are very important if you want to penetrate a market and gain a huge customer base. Premierbet.com is alive to this fact and is offering a number of bonuses. For new members, one is entitled to up to Ksh 2,000 deposit bonus. This means that when you join and deposit Ksh 2,000 and below, you are entitled to a similar bonus amount. Despite this betting company standing out for a number of valid reasons, it’s biggest undoing is the fact that it does not offer any jackpot event. In Kenya, jackpot events are arguably the most sought after events in sports betting. Failure to have this in your artillery means that a huge number of Kenyans will prefer other sites. The company however avails the option of depositing money either through Mpesa or Airtel money. This is important since users of  both networks can make deposits and place their bets with ease.

Homepage

Features

One of the standout features of this site is their simple and easy to use web interface. Clients like a web design that is simple and they can navigate their way around wit ease. This company offers just what customers need. Also, they have multiple betting options since they avail plenty of sports markets to clients. It is disappointing that they do not offer virtual games. These games allow you to make money easy and quickly thus making them a preferred betting option for a large number of Kenyans.

This company got it right by availing bonuses for each new member. Nothing gets to the heart of a gambler faster than a free bonus. They also offer a promotion called mobile madness. This is a free bet given to a member, after placing six other bets beforehand. The conditions that follow the receipt of this bonus is that each of these teams has to have at least 1.5 odds and it has to be placed on the mobile version of their website.

The fact that they have high boosted odds make them stand out from their competitors. In given markets, this company tends to boost its odds such that you are able to win more money each time you place a bet. Their numerous incentives make it a preferred betting site for a number of Kenyans.

Registration

All you have to do is visit the PremierBet website and Click on “REGISTER” on the top right-hand side of the we page. You will get a confirmation message after keying on your details.

Live betting available

Huge deposit bonus

Simple website design.

See what other players are saying about chezacash

Cons.

No jackpot

Limited marketing

No cashout

No casino games

PremierBet Kenya FAQ

How to deposit on PremierBet Kenya from Mpesa

Go your M-Pesa or Airtel money account to pay bill 942564 then enter the account number as Premierbet and place the amount of money you wish to deposit then enter your Mpesa pin. You will then receive a confirmation message.

Withdrawing

 Simply enter into your PremierBet Kenya account and click on “Withdrawal. ” Type in the amount you would like to withdraw and select either M-Pesa or Airtel money.
